entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
